Perceived risk leading to fear has no correlation with the actual risk of an event. This is a problem for humans. We are irrational beings.
"@IhabGaza: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty. https://t.co/pibzcTOpZf" how true 游땕

"@DrKristinaKing: @RslewisSally TIME being the key word." Yes yes yes
@doctorcaldwell I totally agree Gordon
Should time in GP be mandatory? I don't know, but it sure is a useful thing to do .
Time in GP also gives a greater appreciation of risk management holism.
Time in GP also offers experience with tackling undifferentiated illness, thereby improving rapid consulting skills and lateral thinking
Time in GP gives a helicopter view of the system, an appreciation of the importance of population health and generalist skills.
